story.title: We are Authentic
story.body: A true blend of Asian/US food culture. We have assembled a world-class team of chefs, ingredients specialists, and quality-assurance professionals, unrivaled in the US.

body.title: Quality Food
body.desc: All our fish and vegetables we use are fresh and of the highest quality

body.title: Super Tasty
body.desc: We have heavily researched all pour ingredients to ensure that all our food is super tasty

body.title: Fast Delivery
body.desc: Our team of delivery men ensure that your food will arrive speedily to your destination of choice

body.title: Kashrut
body.desc: Though the challenges we have chosen the most stringent Kashrut to be able to serve all walks of life

order.title: Simple Way To Order Your Food
order.body: A true blend of Asian/US food culture. We have assembled a world-class team of chefs, ingredients specialists, and quality-assurance professionals, unrivaled in the US.

testimonials.body: “Delicious sushi! A rare find in this country with good hechsher! Ordered delivery came late but was worth the wait!”
testimonials.name: M.S.
